metadata.title: CVE-2015-8272 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
RTMPDump 2.4 allows remote attackers to trigger a denial of service (NULLpointer dereference and process crash).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8272` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

librtmp0 - 2.4+20121230.gitdf6c518-1ubuntu0.1
rtmpdump - 2.4+20121230.gitdf6c518-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rtmpdump package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4+20121230.gitdf6c518-1ubuntu0.1').
